Home.title: Nexty.dev
Home.tagLine: A Modern Next.js Full-Stack SaaS Template
Home.description: A production-ready Next.js and Supabase starter template for building modern SaaS applications. Launch your content, AI, or subscription service faster.

Hero.title: A Modern Full-Stack SaaS Template
Hero.description: A production-ready Next.js and Supabase starter template for building modern SaaS applications. Launch your content, AI, or subscription service faster.

Features.title: Complete Feature Suite for Rapid Development
Features.description: Our template includes all essential features for modern SaaS applications, allowing you to focus on building your business logic.

items.title: Authentication System
items.description: Integrated Supabase authentication with multiple sign-in options including Google, GitHub, and email verification.

items.title: Payment Integration
items.description: Built-in Stripe payment system supporting both one-time payments and subscriptions, perfect for various SaaS pricing models.

items.title: AI Capabilities
items.description: Seamlessly integrate AI features using AI SDK. Build AI-powered chat and image generation tools with zero AI expertise.

items.title: Content Management
items.description: Built-in CMS with Markdown support, featuring elegant themes for blogs and documentation. Manage your content effortlessly.

items.title: File Storage
items.description: Robust file storage system for handling uploads and management of images, videos, and audio files with ease.

items.title: Internationalization
items.description: Built-in i18n support for seamless localization. Expand your global reach and enhance accessibility across markets.

items.title: Email Newsletter
items.description: Integrated Resend email system for managing subscriptions and sending newsletters to your audience.

items.title: Analytics & Ads
items.description: Support for Google Analytics, Plausible, and AdSense integration. Monitor performance and monetize your platform effectively.

items.title: SEO Optimization
items.description: Implement SEO best practices with meta tags, structured data, sitemaps, and OpenGraph tags to improve search engine rankings.

TechStack.title: Powered by Modern Technologies
TechStack.description: A carefully curated stack of modern technologies ensuring your product is stable, scalable, and maintainable

groups.title: Frontend Framework
groups.description: Modern responsive interfaces built with Next.js and React

groups.title: Backend & Database
groups.description: Secure and reliable data storage with robust authentication

groups.title: AI & Integration
groups.description: AI capabilities and third-party service integration

footer.title: All-in-One Full-Stack Solution
footer.description: A meticulously selected tech stack providing a solid foundation for your project. From frontend to backend, from database to deployment, everything you need in one place.

UseCases.title: One Template, Multiple Solutions
UseCases.description: Nexty is versatile enough to power various web projects - from content sites to AI tools, from free utilities to premium subscription services, all with rapid development and deployment.

cases.title: Brand Landing Pages
cases.description: Create compelling brand pages that showcase your products and services with impact. Our template allows you to build responsive, optimized landing pages that capture visitors' attention and convert them into potential customers, driving successful brand campaigns.

cases.title: AdSense Content Platforms
cases.description: Quickly build SEO-friendly content websites with AdSense integration for passive income generation. With built-in CMS and multilingual support, managing large volumes of content becomes effortless.

cases.title: Free Utility Websites
cases.description: Develop user-friendly tool platforms that deliver efficient experiences. With our template, you can rapidly launch tools that balance great UX with strong SEO, attracting users and increasing traffic to your platform.

cases.title: Premium AI Tools
cases.description: Build efficient, powerful AI applications with premium user experiences and seamless payment flows. Our template makes it easy to implement subscription models, attract users, and boost revenue, helping your AI project launch successfully.

WhyChoose.title: Why Choose Nexty?
WhyChoose.description: Whether you're a developer or a product manager, Nexty helps you save two weeks of time and resources.

items.text: Drastically reduce infrastructure development time so you can focus on core functionality
Clean, well-structured code following industry best practices for seamless scalability
Comprehensive TypeScript definitions to minimize errors and boost development efficiency
Extensive documentation and examples to accelerate your learning curve and avoid common pitfalls
Shorten time-to-market and quickly validate your innovative concepts
Integrated analytics tools provide deep insights into user behavior to optimize product strategy
Superior code architecture allows easy feature additions with AI assistance, even without programming experience
Built-in SEO and performance optimizations to enhance user acquisition efficiency

Testimonials.title: Our Customers Rapidly Launched AI Tools & SaaS Products
Testimonials.description: Discover authentic feedback from developers and product managers who accelerated their project development with Nexty.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Common questions from developers and product managers

items.question: What technical knowledge do I need to use this template?
items.answer: Nexty is an AI-friendly template that caters to all skill levels. If you're new to programming, you can leverage AI-assisted development to implement your requirements. For developers familiar with React and Next.js, you'll find the template particularly intuitive. We provide comprehensive documentation and examples - reviewing these resources first will significantly enhance your development experience.

items.question: Is technical support included with purchase?
items.answer: Absolutely! Technical support is included with all versions. Pro users receive 24/7 email support, while Enterprise customers benefit from dedicated one-on-one support with our technical team.

items.question: Does the template include all features shown in the demo?
items.answer: Yes, every feature showcased in our demo is fully implemented and production-ready in the template. If you have specific feature requests, our team is open to discussing potential additions to future releases.

items.question: Does the template support subscription billing?
items.answer: Yes, Nexty fully supports recurring subscription functionality. You can customize the subscription components and configure pricing tiers according to your business needs.

items.question: Is multilingual support available?
items.answer: Yes, Nexty comes with built-in internationalization support. The template includes English, Chinese, and Japanese out of the box, and you can easily extend it to support additional languages as needed.

items.question: How do I manage pricing plans?
items.answer: This is one of Nexty's standout features. You can manage pricing plans directly through the Dashboard, including creating, editing, and removing pricing tiers. The template includes AI-powered translation capabilities, eliminating the need for manual language file configuration.

items.question: What AI capabilities are built into the template?
items.answer: The template comes with integrated AI image generation and conversational AI features. It's designed to seamlessly integrate with leading AI providers including OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Grok & DeepSeek, enabling you to easily build AI-powered applications.

CTA.title: Launch Your Product Fast, and Earn Money Fast
CTA.description: Stop starting from scratch! Use Nexty templates to focus on your core idea, rapidly build, validate, and start earning.

Pricing.title: One-Time Payment, Lifetime Updates

Prices.title: Pricing Plans
Prices.description: Manage pricing plans for test and live environments. (Admin only).

DeletePlanDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
DeletePlanDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the pricing plan {title} from the database.

CreatePlan.title: Create New Plan
CreatePlan.description: Create a new pricing plan for test and live environments. (Admin only).

EditPlan.title: Edit Plan
EditPlan.description: Modify the details for plan: {title} ({environment}).(Admin only).

PricePlanForm.stripePriceIdRequired: Please enter a Stripe Price ID first.
PricePlanForm.multiLanguageTemplateGenerated: Multi-language template generated. Edit the JSON below.
PricePlanForm.environmentDescription: The Stripe environment this plan belongs to.
PricePlanForm.cardDescriptionPlaceholder: Short description shown on the card...
PricePlanForm.stripeIntegrationDescription: Link this plan to a Stripe Price ID for automated checkout. Leave blank for manual configuration.
PricePlanForm.stripePriceIdDescription: Enter the Price ID from your Stripe Dashboard ({environment} environment).
PricePlanForm.displayPriceDescription: The price shown on the card.
PricePlanForm.displayOriginalPriceDescription: Optional text like a strikethrough price.
PricePlanForm.featuresListDescription: Add features included in this plan.
PricePlanForm.highlightThisPlanDescription: Make this plan stand out visually on the pricing page.
PricePlanForm.highlightTextDescription: Text displayed on the highlight badge.
PricePlanForm.buttonTextDescription: Text for the call-to-action button. Defaults might apply if empty.
PricePlanForm.buttonLinkPlaceholder: Leave empty for Stripe Checkout, or enter URL (https://...) or mailto:
PricePlanForm.buttonLinkDescription: Override Stripe Checkout if filled. Use full URLs or `mailto:email@example.com`.
PricePlanForm.multiLanguageTranslationsDescription: Provide translations for text fields in JSON format.
PricePlanForm.translateByAIDescription: Configure environment variables NEXT_PUBLIC_AI_MODEL_ID and NEXT_PUBLIC_AI_PROVIDER to use AI translation.
PricePlanForm.languageJSONDescription: JSON object keyed by language code (e.g., "en", "zh", "jp"). Ensure valid JSON.
PricePlanForm.planBenefitsDescription: Define the benefits users receive after purchasing this plan.
PricePlanForm.benefitsJSONDescription: Define the benefits users receive after purchasing this plan in JSON format.
PricePlanForm.displayOrderDescription: Lower numbers appear first. Defaults to 0.
PricePlanForm.activeStatusDescription: Controls whether this plan is visible to users.

AIDemo.title: AI Capabilities Demo
AIDemo.description: This page showcases non-public features and is exclusively for users who have purchased the template. It's designed for learning and testing the AI model invocation process. To use it, simply launch the template locally and input your API key in the environment variables. The AI demo includes functionalities like single-turn and multi-turn conversations, text-to-image, image-to-image, and text/image-to-video conversions. Through this demo, you can quickly grasp the AI invocation workflow, accelerating your journey in building AI applications.
AIDemo.metaDescription: This page showcases AI capabilities including single-turn and multi-turn conversations, text-to-image, image-to-image, and text/image-to-video conversions.
